summary.Title: Senior Software Engineer
summary.Presentation: Do you want to create a future where internet connectivity knows no boundaries? Then join our client CobhamSATCOM on their fantastic transformatio

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to create a future where internet connectivity knows no boundaries? Then join our client CobhamSATCOM on their fantastic transformational journey to help keep people safe and connected in the remotest areas of the world!

 

Requirements:

  • Experience in developing software in a Linux environment
  • Knowledge of application, feature and API design
  • Used to unit testing and automated validation methods
  • Experience with debugging and troubleshooting of embedded applications
  • Mastering scripting tools like bash and Python
  • Knowledge of agile development processes, test automation and continuous integration
  • Master or BSc in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Network Technology or equivalent

 

You’re excited to work with:

  • Linux architecture, infrastructure and best practices in an embedded domain
  • Ethernet network and data communication protocols
  • Object oriented design and programming in C++ and STL
  • Solving complex engineering challenges
  • Talented and accommodating colleagues in a project team
  • Continuous improvement of products, methods and skills


We offer:

  • 18.000 – 25.000 PLN net/month
  • Stable, permanent employment based on your choice (UoP/B2B)
  • Remote hybrid option – we’d love to see you a few times a month
  • Personal development budget
  • Insurance
  • Stay-on bonus
  • Central and modern office space in Kraków
  • Onboarding trip to Copenhagen
  • Flat management structure following a Scandinavian work culture
  • Which other benefits are important to you? Let us know!

Referral bonus: 5,000 PLN if we sign an engineer based on your recommendation.

Interested?
Apply here. 

If you have any questions about the position or Cobham, please get in touch with Tommy Both Juul on tbj@mpeople.dk or +45 25 64 28 28.

We look forward to hearing from you.

#jobsforukraine
